verses.text: We have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* with our \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w told|strong="H5608"\w* us, \add what\add* \w work|strong="H6467"\w* thou \w didst|strong="H6466"\w* in their \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, in the \w times|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*.\f + \fr 44.1 \ft Maschil: or, of instruction\f*

\add How\add* thou didst drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* with thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w plantedst|strong="H5193"\w* them; \add how\add* thou didst \w afflict|strong="H7489"\w* the \w people|strong="H3816"\w*, and cast them \w out|strong="H7971"\w*.

For they \w got|strong="H3423"\w* not the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* in \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* by their own \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, neither did their own \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* them: but thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and thine \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of thy \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*, because thou hadst a \w favour|strong="H7521"\w* unto them.
Thou art my \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w deliverances|strong="H3444"\w* for \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

Through thee will we push \w down|strong="H5055"\w* our \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*: through thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* will we tread them \w under|strong="H0947"\w* that rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against us.
For I will not \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in my \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, neither shall my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me.
But thou hast \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* us from our \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*, and hast put them to \w shame|strong="H0954"\w* that \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* us.

In \w God|strong="H0430"\w* we \w boast|strong="H1984"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long, and \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
\w But|strong="H0637"\w* thou hast cast \w off|strong="H2186"\w*, and put us to \w shame|strong="H3637"\w*; and goest not \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* with our \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*.
Thou makest us to \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w* from the \w enemy|strong="H6862"\w*: and they which \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* us \w spoil|strong="H8154"\w* for themselves.

Thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us like \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \add appointed\add* for \w meat|strong="H3978"\w*; and hast \w scattered|strong="H2219"\w* us among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 44.11 \ft like…: Heb. as sheep of meat\f*

Thou \w sellest|strong="H4376"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* for \w nought|strong="H1952"\w*, and dost not \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \add thy wealth\add* by their \w price|strong="H4242"\w*.\f + \fr 44.12 \ft for…: Heb. without riches\f*

Thou \w makest|strong="H7760"\w* us a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* to our \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w*, a \w scorn|strong="H3933"\w* and a \w derision|strong="H7047"\w* to them that are round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* us.

Thou \w makest|strong="H7760"\w* us a \w byword|strong="H4912"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, a \w shaking|strong="H4493"\w* of the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* among the \w people|strong="H3816"\w*.
My \w confusion|strong="H3639"\w* \add is\add* \w continually|strong="H3117"\w* before me, and the \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* of my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* hath \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* me,

For the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of him that \w reproacheth|strong="H2778"\w* and \w blasphemeth|strong="H1442"\w*; by \w reason|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* and \w avenger|strong="H5358"\w*.
All this is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon us; yet have we not \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* thee, neither have we dealt \w falsely|strong="H8266"\w* in thy \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

Our \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is not \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*, neither have our \w steps|strong="H0838"\w* \w declined|strong="H5186"\w* from thy \w way|strong="H0734"\w*;\f + \fr 44.18 \ft steps: or, goings\f*

Though thou hast sore \w broken|strong="H1794"\w* us in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* us with the shadow of \w death|strong="H6757"\w*.

If we have \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, or stretched \w out|strong="H6566"\w* our \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* to a \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w*;
Shall not \w God|strong="H0430"\w* search this \w out|strong="H2713"\w*? for he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* the \w secrets|strong="H8587"\w* of the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
Yea, for thy sake are we \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long; we are \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* as \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* for the \w slaughter|strong="H2878"\w*.

\w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, why \w sleepest|strong="H3462"\w* thou, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*? \w arise|strong="H6974"\w*, cast \add us\add* not \w off|strong="H2186"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*.
Wherefore \w hidest|strong="H5641"\w* thou thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \add and\add* \w forgettest|strong="H7911"\w* our \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* and our \w oppression|strong="H3906"\w*?

For our \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* is bowed \w down|strong="H7743"\w* to the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*: our \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* \w cleaveth|strong="H1692"\w* unto the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* for our \w help|strong="H5833"\w*, and \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* us for thy \w mercies’|strong="H2617"\w* sake.\f + \fr 44.26 \ft for our…: Heb. a help for us\f*
